settings.editor: Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

Sliced cheese (our favorite isthick-sliced, medium cheddar), Dill pickle slices, Fresh red onions (or caramelized onions), Tomato, Green leaf or iceberg lettuce, Avocado, Bacon + pineapple + the BBQ sauce below, Jalapeños to add some heat.
